title: useless teams
body: wtf is wrong with lol, im getting the worst teams i swear to God every game i either have a troll or afker this game went shit when players like that joined, ive had 1 good team just FUCKING ONE FUCKING GOOD FUCKING TEAM OUT OF 15 FUCKING USELESS FUCKING SHIT GAMES, FIX YOUR SHIT AND MATCHMAKING

replies.body:
There could be many reasons as to why this is happening. First you must understand that OCE isn't as well monitored as the other regions are, so if you were used to playing on another region before coming here, you should expect the community to be slightly worse upfront.

What could be happening is that the way your express yourself could be bringing out the worst in people, thus causing them to do things like troll and afk. You could try and refrain from swearing via text. There's no need for it and you can't say you can't control it, as you need a steady hand to type.

Do you think this is Help & Supports?

%%%% off, you're being matched with people the same level as you.
Although this is what he deserves, it won't help anyone. People deserve an explanation, no matter how rude they are about it.
